title: 4 Minute Mile
description: A teenage track star and a former coach who each face difficult obstacles in life turn to each other to find comfort, stability and hope.
actors: Kelly Blatz, Richard Jenkins, Cam Gigandet, Analeigh Tipton

title: 41 Dogs in My Home
description: This documentary explores the lives of obsessive British pet owners, whose love of animals has reached extreme levels.
This biopic focuses on baseball icon Jackie Robinson, who in 1947 became the first black Major League Baseball player of the modern era.
actors: Chadwick Boseman, Harrison Ford, Nicole Beharie, Christopher Meloni

title: 44 Pages
description: This intimate documentary explores the history of Highlights magazine, from its humble roots to the planning surrounding its 70th anniversary edition.

title: 45 Years
description: As Kate and Geoff prepare to celebrate their 45th anniversary, shocking news reopens old wounds and reveals painful secrets about Geoff's past.
actors: Charlotte Rampling, Tom Courtenay, Geraldine James, Dolly Wells

title: 47 Meters Down
description: With little oxygen left in their scuba tanks, two sisters are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean while great whites circle nearby.
actors: Mandy Moore, Claire Holt, Matthew Modine, Chris Johnson

title: 48 Christmas Wishes
description: When a small town's letters to Santa accidentally go up in smoke, two elves venture out of the North Pole to retrieve every missing wish.
actors: Khiyla Aynne, Noah Dyer, Maya Franzoi, Clara Kushnir

title: 4th Man Out
description: A young mechanic comes out to his extremely straight best friends. Once they get used to the idea, they're determined to help him find the right guy.
actors: Evan Todd, Parker Young, Chord Overstreet, Jon Gabrus
